mapper.select: SELECT cob.month AS month, cob.monthly_amount AS totalAmount FROM cost_of_beneficiary cob WHERE cob.beneficiary_id = #{beneficiaryId} ORDER BY cob.month DESC

SELECT mst.id AS serviceTypeId, mst.name AS serviceTypeName, COUNT(bs.id) AS usageCount FROM beneficiary_schedule bs JOIN m_service_type mst ON mst.id = bs.service_type_id WHERE bs.beneficiary_id = #{beneficiaryId} AND DATE_FORMAT(bs.start_time, '%Y-%m') = #{month} GROUP BY mst.id, mst.name ORDER BY mst.id
